author: snichol
msg: Warn against putting service classes that depend on Apache SOAP in
the lib or classes directories under %CATALINA_HOME%.

author: snichol
msg: Use larger buffer for output by default.  This will prevent Nagle from
waiting 200 ms for delayed ACK, since either (1) the headers+payload will
fit in the buffer and be flushed as a single write, (2) the headers will
be larger than a segment, so the first segment sent will be full, which
will prevent a delayed ACK by the server, or (3) the payload will be
larger than a segment, so more than a segment of data will be queued
after the headers are written, which causes most (all?) stacks to send
another (full) segment without waiting for the ACK for the first segment.
Return to leaving Nagling alone by default (i.e. don't call setTcpNoDelay).

author: snichol
msg: Add client support for HTTP redirects.

author: snichol
msg: Add more information about securing the service manager and admin pages.
